name: Aim Assist (jklthn)
description:
Face off in a 2v2 duel with a twist - your enemy is invisible!

Aim Assist is a fast paced Multiplatform shooter where your team will consist of a shooter and a spotter. You and your partner need to work together quickly to find and eliminate the enemy team before they find you. 

This is a student project - any feedback is more than welcome!

The Shooter (PC), you're tasked with the role of facing off against the enemy shooter in a western-style standoff, but with a catch; the enemy is invisible!

The Spotter (Mobile), you're tasked with the role of locating the enemy shooter. Using pings, powerups and communication, work with your shooter to eliminate the enemy shooter!


  • Eliminated your enemies in a fast paced western style map.
  • Online multiplayer where you can play with your friends on PC and Android
  • Rag-doll physics that will literally blow your opponent away!
  • A simple in-game shop where you can change your gun skins!
Archie Paxton - Project Manager
